me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui

Class AccessControlGadget

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.Gadget
      • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.ClickableGadget
        • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.CyclerGadget<AccessControl>
          • me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.gui.AccessControlGadget

  • public class AccessControlGadget
extends CyclerGadget<AccessControl>
    A gadget which can display and update the access control for an STB block.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccessControlGadget

        public AccessControlGadget(InventoryGUI gui,
                   int slot,
                   BaseSTBBlock stb)
        Construct an access control gadget.

        The stb parameter would normally refer to a different block than the GUI's owner. This allows, for example, a GUI to be created on a non-block item to be used to configure the access control settings for another block.

        Parameters:
        gui - the GUI to add the gadget to
        slot - the GUI slot to display the gadget in
        stb - the STB block that the gadget controls

      • AccessControlGadget

        public AccessControlGadget(InventoryGUI gui,
                   int slot)
        Construct an access control gadget.
        Parameters:
        gui - the GUI to add the gadget to
        slot - the GUI slot to display the gadget in
